name: The Original
desc: This is the base moon cresent that has been here since the beginning of the website. The icon is the Windows version of the üåô emoji. Nothing more to say about it.

name: Sunset
desc: Wanted to make something that was not only easy to make, but clean too. So I went with a gradient design to make it feel like more of a sunset than a moon. I used different degrees for the two different gradients (the main moon and the border) to create a weird effect with the moon that I am a fan of.

name: Earth
desc: A pretty easy one to explain, its earth.
desc2: I used the same earth picture that I use on the JPTR Agario website.

name: Nosferatu
desc: I wanted to add a spongebob reference to the website, so if you thought of spongebob when seeing this then you were thinking the same way I was.
desc2: Nosferatu is one of many theatrical representations of Dracula, famously making an apperence in Spongebob when the lights were flicking on and off. Nosferatu released in 1922, making a name for itself as one of the first truly scary movies to come out for its time.

name: Pink
desc: This is one of a few very simple designs. Just a recolored moon cresent.

name: Mint
desc: Just like Pink, heres a minty color.

name: Vaporwave
desc: A simple gradient that has been done way too many times.

name: Rainbow
desc: It's a rainbow!!

name: JPTR Background
desc: This is a old imadejptr reference. The image being the background of the old website and the border being the same color as the homepage (#00151f).
desc2: Originally used in the old versions of imadejptr, this old relic is the one reminder of the past.

name: Pen Pen
desc: Wanted to add another Evangelion reference to my website since there seems to be no end in sight for adding anything Evangelion related. Decided to give Pen Pen the erect-crested penguin a spot here with every other moon I made.
desc2: Pen Pen is an erect-crested penguin, and the coolest pet in the whole show.

name: Tiktok
desc: Made this image from scratch, wanted to encapsulate the absolute hell that is tiktok. Subway Surfers? Or baby getting chased by a monster? I hate this one to be honest

name: Galaxy
desc: I found a random picture of a galaxy from the internet, and I've had it for the last 4 years so I have no clue where it came from. We can admire its beauty though.

name: Monke Swimming
desc: ‚ùù Life could be dream, life could be dream‚ùû - The Chords

name: Blue & White
desc: Read the name, I wanted to try to make something light but I feel like this design could've been better.

name: Wojak Shock
desc: OH MY GOD!!
desc2: This is where I found it

name: Bad Breath
desc: There is a story with this one. There is a dude with horrible breath that is stinking up the whole room. The other dude behind him starts having a mental breakdown as the horrible breath slowly turned to smoke.

name: Moonface
desc: I wanted to make something like the McDonalds old Moon Man, so I decided to make the colors resemble the moon and use a face that I drew a long time ago.

name: R-Block
desc: Made this one from scratch. It's just an ad for a youtube channel, its called R-Block. I'm honestly really sorry for this one.

name: Pink & Orange
desc: Just a simple gradient coming on a 45 degree angle.

name: Pete The Rock
desc: Say hello to Pete The Rock :)
